trans-unit.source: Stores references to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"></xref> objects indexed by name.
trans-unit.target: 將參考儲存<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"></xref>物件依名稱編製索引。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to store the default provider in the single-provider scenario.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來儲存在單一提供者案例中的預設提供者。

trans-unit.source: In multiple-provider scenarios, you can use this collection to choose a specific personalization provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在多個提供者的情況下，您可以選擇特定的個人化提供者在執行階段使用此集合。

trans-unit.source: Personalization providers in the collection are indexed according to the name of each provider as set in the Web.config or the Machine.config configuration file using the [providers Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195) attribute.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的個人化提供者會根據每個提供者的名稱在 Web.config 或 Machine.config 組態檔使用中索引[進行個人化的 web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的提供者項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195)屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProviderCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProviderCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProviderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProviderCollection>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProviderCollection>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Adds an instance of a class that implements <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將實作的類別的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"></xref>至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>-derived instances to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>-衍生集合的執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: The personalization provider to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入個人化提供者。

trans-unit.source: The provider specified is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的提供者不是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The provider parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Copies the personalization providers in the collection to an array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 個人化提供者集合中複製到陣列中，指定索引處開始。

trans-unit.source: The array is an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances.
trans-unit.target: 陣列是陣列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: The array to which the personalization providers are copied.
trans-unit.target: 個人化提供者會複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The location in the array at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始複製的陣列中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a personalization provider based on the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得根據指定名稱的個人化提供者。

trans-unit.source: Personalization providers in the collection are indexed according to the name of each provider, as set in the Web.config or Machine.config configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的個人化提供者會在 Web.config 或 Machine.config 的組態檔中設定索引根據每個提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: 個人化提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: 個人化提供者的名稱。
